record.title: ORDER FOR ADJOURNMENT

speaking.paragraph: I now ask that following the remarks of Senator Dole, the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Pending the arrival of Senator Dole, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
